description: A React component file defining a 'RecipeCard' component for a recipe browsing application. The component renders a visual card with recipe image, name, description, tags, cooking info, and favorite toggle functionality.

methods.name: RecipeCard
methods.description: React functional component rendering a card UI for a given recipe, with favorite toggle button and detailed info.

methods.name: handleToggleFavorite
methods.description: Handles adding or removing the recipe from favorites when the button is clicked.
